Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class MarketController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.ControllerGuiInterface
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.MarketController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>
public class MarketController
extends ControllerGuiInterface
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>
The type Market controller. Show market with marbles and allows player to buy something Activate even when it's not players turn
